thread.title: [Poll] Are you happy with the specs of the Galaxy S8 and S8+?
thread.title_full: [Poll] Are you happy with the specs of the Galaxy S8 and S8+?

author: Adnan F.
title: [Poll] Are you happy with the specs of the Galaxy S8 and S8+?
text:
Adnan F. / 45 mins ago 
Samsung unveiled the Galaxy S8 and Galaxy S8+ earlier today, finally ending months of speculation about its new flagship smartphone. We now have all of the official details about the Galaxy S8′s specs, features and availability . 
Speaking of specifications, are you happy with the specs that Samsung’s new flagship smartphone is offering? Or do you think that Samsung should have provided more given how much it’s charging for this handset? 
Vote below and let us know in the comments section what you think and what specs you would have liked to see in its new flagship. Are you happy with the specs of the Galaxy S8 and S8+? Yes, I am! I think the specs are great I'm not opposed to them, but they could have been better No. I think Samsung should have offered more with the Galaxy S8
